creator: Gameloft SE
descriptionHtml:
Saddle up for fun, friendship and adventure with all of the most popular ponies in Equestria in the free official game based on the phenomenal MLP TV show!
Only Twilight Sparkle -- the student of Princess Celestia -- and her friends Rainbow Dash, Fluttershy and the rest can save the day for every horse in the city as they farm resources, meet cute friends and reach for their dreams!
* OVER 300 CHARACTERS: Meet a royal prince or princess one day, a cute adventure-seeking horse the next day and who knows what the next! Give them places to stay, nibble on hay and hear what they have to say.
* SO MUCH TO EXPLORE: See the Crystal Empire, Canterlot, Sweet Apple Acres farm and more!
* MAKE A PRETTY PONY HOME: Beautify your MLP town and make it better than in any other city builders out there with cute houses, adorable decorations and enough magic for everypony that gallops by!
* FANTASTIC QUESTS: Go on adventures based on your favourite stories from the TV show, and confront villains such as Tirek, King Sombra, Nightmare Moon, the Changelings and more!
* MINI-GAMES: Play Ball Bounce with Twilight Sparkle, Magic Wings with Rainbow Dash, and get down with every horse in town in the Equestria Girls Dance games!
* CUSTOM FASHION: Give cute makeovers to turn any pony into a prince or princess pony with royal dresses and beautiful hairstyles featuring a rainbow of colours.
* FRIENDSHIP IS MAGIC: Interact with friends and compete in hoof-pounding events!
* REAL PONY VOICES: Enjoy the official voice talent from the show!
Perfect for fans of city builders, free games or anyone who dreams of lounging on a pile of hay on the farm, surrounded by cute MLP horse friends such as Twilight Sparkle and Rainbow Dash, and becoming a royal prince or princess.
_
You can download and play this game for free. Please be informed that it also allows you to play using virtual currency, which can be acquired as you progress through the game, or by paying with real money. In-app purchases range from £0.79 to £79.99. You can restrict in-app purchases by adjusting your User Controls in your Play Store settings.
Languages: English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Brazilian Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish, Turkish, Arabic and Thai.
An additional download of 50 to 150 MB is required to play this game. Please note the size of this required download may change without notice.
The game requires an Internet connection (3G or Wi-Fi) for downloads and updates, and other features including playing with friends, making in-app purchases and watching advertisements.
Certain aspects of this game, such as collaborating with, playing against or sharing in-game items with other players will require the player to connect to the Internet. Please note this connection is never compulsory to progress through the game. These features may be disabled in certain countries.
This app contains advertising for Gameloft products or products from some third parties which will redirect you to a third-party site. You can disable your device's ad identifier being used for interest-based advertising in the settings menu of your device. This option can be found in the Settings app > Accounts (Personal) > Google > Ads (Settings and Privacy) > Opt out of interest-based ads.
If you choose to allow us to do so, we may collect precise geolocation information in order for you to see players in your area and to bring you more relevant and geographically appropriate advertisements.
__

descriptionShort: The official free MLP game! Meet Twilight Sparkle, Rainbow Dash & more ponies!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Children's Day is coming, and we have a special adventure lined up that'll help everyone get in touch with their inner child... even if you're still one!

KID'S PLAY
Trixie, the magnificent magician, has a new trick up her sleeve and she wants everypony to help her try it out. But instead of making duplicates of her assistants, it creates young versions of them all! See what magical mischief a pint-sized Applejack, Twilight Sparkle, Rarity & the rest get up to in this special Limited-Time Story!

descriptionShort: The official free MLP game! Meet Twilight Sparkle, Rainbow Dash & more ponies!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Everypony’s showing their parents some love in a pair of special Limited-Time Stories dedicated to the bonds of family!

**WHAT’S NEW**

PINKIE PIE PARENTS PROBLEM
Pinkie Pie plans a family reunion and learns what raising a foal was like from some friends of the family.

WONDERBOLT FOR A DAY
A day of buckball practice turns into an impromptu Wonderbolts lesson. But Rainbow Dash may need help from her folks to whip a newbie into shape!

Don’t miss the fun. Download the update now!

descriptionShort: The official free MLP game! Meet Twilight Sparkle, Rainbow Dash & more ponies!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Ready to take off on a superhero adventure? Feeling pumped to jump into the ring? Enjoy all this plus plenty of Friendship Day fun & festivities for all!

**WHAT’S NEW**

TWO NEW LIMITED-TIME STORIES

THE POWER PONIES: Help Pinkie Pie and Rarity swoop in and save a herd of heroes to stop the evil Mane-iac!

THE E.W.H. TOURNAMENT: Are you ready to ROUGHHOOOUUSE!!! Help Cheerilee don the mask of “The Mystery Mare” to win a wrestling tournament on her injured sister’s behalf.

descriptionShort: The official free MLP game! Meet Twilight Sparkle, Rainbow Dash & more ponies!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New stories await! Join the ponies on journeys of fun and growth as you learn more about them and what it means to grow up.

**WHAT'S NEW**

ANTI-SUGAR LEAGUE: A sugar panic puts Pinkie Pie's party in peril! Prevent the Anti-Sugar League from souring her plans in a new blitz event.

GROWING UP IS HARD TO DO: When you're a do-gooder like Fluttershy, it can feel like you never have a moment to relax. If only she could pretend to be an ordinary pony for a day… Join her adventure in this new event!

descriptionShort: The official free MLP game! Meet Twilight Sparkle, Rainbow Dash & more ponies!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Check out new limited-time stories! Halloween's coming, and who knows what tricks (& treats) it has in store?

WHAT'S NEW

TALE OF TIREK: Trixie's studying Centaurian magic, but not everypony is happy about it. Help her & Starlight Glimmer avoid a magical catastrophe as they learn these special spells.

LEAGUE OF EVIL: Everypony wants to enjoy a normal Nightmare Night, but the Villain League has other plans. Maybe the best way to beat a villain is with a villain... or at least, a former villain!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Everypony, experience a brand-new type of limited-time event, along with a captivating story!

descriptionShort: The official free MLP game! Meet Twilight Sparkle, Rainbow Dash & more ponies!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Everypony, we have two new adventures ahead! Enjoy them while helping your favorite characters!

• MEET THE "CHANGE SIX"! Are Twilight Sparkle and her friends actually Changelings? A bunch of Changeling kids sure seem to think so! Find out what's going on in a new limited-time event!

• MEET YOUR HEROES! What will Rainbow Dash's legacy be…? Wonderbolts past, present and future help her figure it out, in a new limited-time event!

Don't forget to give us a five-star rating ;)

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi, everypony!

We have new adventures for you!

• HIGH NOON AT CANTER CREEK: Trouble is coming to Equestria's Far West… and Applejack's the only pony with gumption enough to fix it!

Explore new stories together ;)

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi, everypony! Are you ready for some new adventures?

• A PERFECT PAIR. Relive the charming, romantic story of Bright Mac and Pear Butter -- that's Applejack's parents, to you -- in this Blitz Limited-Time Story!

Let’s enjoy them together ;)

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi, everypony! New adventures are ready!

• I AM PONYACCI! The comedian Ponyacci is in town and he's got a problem that only Pinkie Pie can solve!

descriptionShort: Official game to adventure with Twilight Sparkle, Rainbow Dash & more ponies

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi, everypony! New adventures are ready!

• I AM PONYACCI! The comedian Ponyacci is in town and he's got a problem that only Pinkie Pie can solve!

• CROWNS AND CHAOS! Every noblepony has been infused with chaos magic?! Help Trixie prove that this is not her fault!

• NEW HORIZONS AHEAD! Welcome Mermares and pirate treasure. Make your Ponyville bigger!

• BUMP, SET, SPIKE! Help Scootaloo and her friends win the beach volleyball tournament!

Enjoy new adventures with us ;)

descriptionShort: Official game to adventure with Twilight Sparkle, Rainbow Dash & more ponies

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi, everypony! We have new adventures!

• VACATION FRUSTRATION! Celestia's and Luna's wilderness trip is about to be spoiled! Help Fluttershy straighten out the situation.

• GIT ALONG, LI'L DOGIES! Raise friendly animals on a farm with a new feature!

• GAME ALONG, LI'L PONIES! Now all your faves who previously reached 5 stars can continue to play to their heart's content!

• A COSMIC CONUNDRUM. Cosmos trapped ponies from Equestria in her labyrinth! Will you help?

Enjoy new adventures with us!

descriptionShort: Official game to adventure with Twilight Sparkle, Rainbow Dash & more ponies

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi, everypony! We have new adventures!

• Welcome Back, Twilight. Changeling and Kirin instructors are coming to the School for Gifted Unicorns… but their first day isn't going as planned! Help Twilight in a new limited-time event!

• Danger in Dimondia. Rainbow Dash receives a mysterious summons to the Diamond Dog kingdom of Dimondia… and is accused of a crime she only sorta committed! Help her set things right in a new limited-time event!

Let’s enjoy together ;)

Saddle up for fun, friendship and adventure with all of the most popular ponies in Equestria in the free official game based on the phenomenal MLP TV show.

Only Twilight Sparkle -- the student of Princess Celestia -- and her friends Rainbow Dash, Fluttershy and the rest can save the day for every horse in the city as they farm resources, meet cute friends and reach for their dreams.

· Over 300 characters: Meet a royal prince or princess one day, a cute adventure-seeking horse the next day and who knows what the next. Give them places to stay, nibble on hay and hear what they have to say.
Explore the Crystal Empire, Canterlot, Sweet Apple Acres farm and more.

· Make a pretty pony home: Beautify your MLP town and make it better than in any other city builders out there with cute houses, adorable decorations and enough magic for everypony that gallops by.

· Fantastic quests: Go on adventures based on your favorite stories from the TV show, and confront villains such as Tirek, King Sombra, Nightmare Moon, the Changelings and more.

· Mini-games: Play Ball Bounce with Twilight Sparkle, Magic Wings with Rainbow Dash, and get down with every horse in town in the Equestria Girls Dance games.

· Custom fashion: Give cute makeovers to turn any pony into a prince or princess pony with royal dresses and beautiful hairstyles featuring a rainbow of colors.

· Friendship is magic: Interact with friends and compete in hoof-pounding events.

· Real pony voices: Enjoy the official voice talent from the show.
Perfect for fans of city builders, free games or anyone who dreams of lounging on a pile of hay on the farm, surrounded by cute MLP horse friends such as Twilight Sparkle and Rainbow Dash, and becoming a royal prince or princess.
_____
You can download and play this game for free. Please be informed that it also allows you to play using virtual currency, which can be acquired as you progress through the game, or by deciding to watch certain advertisements, or by paying with real money. Purchases of virtual currency using real money are performed using a credit card, or other form of payment associated with your account, and are activated when you input your Google Play account password, without the need to re-enter your credit card number or PIN.
In-app purchases can be restricted by adjusting the authentication settings within your Play Store settings (Google Play Store Home > Settings > Require authentication for purchases) and setting up a password for each purchase / Every 30 minutes or Never.
Disabling password protection may result in unauthorized purchases. We strongly encourage you to keep password protection turned on if you have children or if others could have access to your device.
This game contains advertising for Gameloft’s products or some third parties which will redirect you to a third-party site. You can disable your device’s ad identifier being used for interest-based advertising in the settings menu of your device. This option can be found in the Settings app > Accounts (Personal) > Google > Ads (Settings and Privacy) > Opt out of interest-based ads.
Certain aspects of this game will require the player to connect to the Internet.
_____

This app allows you to purchase virtual items within the app and may contain third-party advertisements that may redirect you to a third-party site.

Terms of Use: http://www.gameloft.com/en/conditions-of-use
Privacy Policy: http://www.gameloft.com/en/privacy-notice
End-User License Agreement: http://www.gameloft.com/en/eula
descriptionShort: Official game to adventure with Twilight Sparkle, Rainbow Dash & more ponies

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi, everypony! New adventures await you!

• Happy Ponyversary! Celebrate ten magical years of playing in Ponyville with a limited-time festival full of gifts, rewards, and prizes!

• Applejack Dreams of Robot Ponies: Flim and Flam are back at Sweet Apple Acres with a "foolproof plan" to mechanize the farm... but Applejack's having none of it!

• Generation Gap: History meets the future in a transdimensional limited-time event for the ages!

Enjoy new adventures with us ;)

In-app purchases range from £0.79 to £79.99. You can restrict in-app purchases by adjusting your User Controls in your Play Store settings.
Languages: English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Brazilian Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish, Turkish, Arabic and Thai.
An additional download of 50 to 150 MB is required to play this game. Please note the size of this required download may change without notice.
The game requires an Internet connection (3G or Wi-Fi) for downloads and updates, and other features including playing with friends, making in-app purchases and watching advertisements.
Certain aspects of this game, such as collaborating with, playing against or sharing in-game items with other players will require the player to connect to the Internet. Please note this connection is never compulsory to progress through the game. These features may be disabled in certain countries.
This app contains advertising for Gameloft products or products from some third parties which will redirect you to a third-party site. You can disable your device's ad identifier being used for interest-based advertising in the settings menu of your device. This option can be found in the Settings app > Accounts (Personal) > Google > Ads (Settings and Privacy) > Opt out of interest-based ads.
If you choose to allow us to do so, we may collect precise geolocation information in order for you to see players in your area and to bring you more relevant and geographically appropriate advertisements.
__

descriptionShort: Official game to adventure with Twilight Sparkle, Rainbow Dash & more ponies

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi, everypony! We have new adventures for you!

• Two-Sided Story. The Mane Six transform into Kirin to help Autumn Blaze... but can they handle the Nirik within?

• Viva La Pinkie Pie: Part Two! Have you heard the story about how Pinkie Pie once ruled the Las Pegasus arcade scene?!

• Camera Sensitivity. Adjust the swipe speed! Go to "Game Settings" for more info.

• Critter Ranch Improvements. Fully upgraded farms will become resource-generating shops as well!

Enjoy new adventures with us ;)

descriptionShort: Official game to adventure with Twilight Sparkle, Rainbow Dash & more ponies

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi, everypony! New adventures are ready!

• A Mistmane New Year: Mistmane is organizing a parade for her homeland's holiday!

• A Mermare's Tale: Hear the love story of Hoofbeard and Jewel, a pony pirate and a mermare!

• Generations - Dance Party! We never DID get to finish the Bestie Festie, did we? Fix that!

• Daily Goals: Get a new set of goals every day to win rewards!

• Fences! Use them to guide where your ponies can walk in Sweet Apple Acres!

Enjoy new adventures ;)

descriptionShort: Official game to adventure with Twilight Sparkle, Rainbow Dash & more ponies

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi, everypony! New adventures are ready!

• Nightmare Rarity, Retold: Relive the story of Nightmare Rarity and her ill-fated lunar excursion, with a Spikey twist!

• Level Cap Increase: How high can you climb? The level cap has been increased from 160 to 200, now with cool new rewards!

• Avatar Selection: Get yourself an all-new avatar and a sweet frame to put it in!

• Boosters: Score twice the Bits or XP for a limited time in brand-new Booster packs!

Enjoy new adventures!

descriptionShort: Official game to adventure with Twilight Sparkle, Rainbow Dash & more ponies

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi, everypony! New adventures are ready!

• Adventures in Rockology: It’s an archaeological race for the ages, as Maud Pie and Rarity delve deep into the Crystal Mountain Caves ahead of a very driven rival!

• New Feature: Gem Ponies! Starting now, a select few ponies can do tasks that dig up Gems! Spike approves, and we bet you will, too!

• New Feature: New Fences! Want your ponies to be in the know about where to go? Enjoy an all-new selection of Fence décor for Canterlot and Ponyville!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

descriptionShort: Official game to adventure with Twilight Sparkle, Rainbow Dash & more ponies

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi, everypony! New adventures are ready!

• New feature: Pro Decorations. Decorate like a pro! Strategically placed pro decorations boost the performance of nearby Bit or Gem shops.
• New feature: Cow Critters. Say "hay" to your new friends! All-new critters have come to Sweet Apple Acres! Move quickly to meet some new friends!
• Limited-Time Story: The Hooffields and McColts. Join Fluttershy & Twilight Sparkle, who are caught in the crossfire between two feuding families.

• Limited-Time Story: The Case of the Pilfered Pins! Somepony's been stealing the pins from the Ponyville bowling alley, and our favorite schoolpony super-sleuths are on the case!

• Star Mastery Upgrade! Get ready to fly to new heights! There are now thousands more Stars to collect, which means a whole barrel-full of new challenges and rewards!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi, everypony! New adventures are ready!

• New Pets and Accessories: What do dragons and hoofbags have in common? Not much, unless you're a dragon who likes to accessorize. Oh, and they're both in our latest round of pony pets and accoutrements!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• Expanded Customization! Display more than just your avatar with a special card including your background, cutie mark, and game progress.
• For Boss Rush Events: Blitz events now continue past the final boss, converting all Sapphires into Gems.
• New Limited-Time Story: The Bashful Barber! Can Fluttershy and students help Zephyr Breeze regain confidence?
• New Limited-Time Story: Spirit of the Forest! The Cutie Mark Crusaders fight to save the White Tail Woods from Filthy Rich's mill.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi, everypony! New adventures are ready!

• New Seasonal Shop: Friends Can Change the World! Cutie Mark or not, the ponies prove that friendship can take many forms!

• New Limited-Time Story: A Tale of Tirek, Part Four! Twilight Sparkle and Starlight Glimmer co-teach a new class at the School of Friendship. Tirek and Tirek wannabes beware!

Explore the Crystal Empire, Canterlot, Sweet Apple Acres farm and more.

• Make a pretty pony home: Beautify your MLP town and make it better than in any other city builders out there with cute houses, adorable decorations and enough magic for everypony that gallops by.

• Fantastic quests: Go on adventures based on your favourite stories from the TV show, and confront villains such as Tirek, King Sombra, Nightmare Moon, the Changelings and more.

• Mini-games: Play Ball Bounce with Twilight Sparkle, Magic Wings with Rainbow Dash, and get down with every horse in town in the Equestria Girls Dance games.

• Custom fashion: Give cute makeovers to turn any pony into a prince or princess pony with royal dresses and beautiful hairstyles featuring a rainbow of colours.

• Friendship is magic: Interact with friends and compete in hoof-pounding events.

• Real pony voices: Enjoy the official voice talent from the show.
Perfect for fans of city builders, free games or anyone who dreams of lounging on a pile of hay on the farm, surrounded by cute MLP horse friends such as Twilight Sparkle and Rainbow Dash, and becoming a royal prince or princess.

You can download and play this game for free. Please be informed that it also allows you to play using virtual currency, which can be acquired as you progress through the game, or by paying with real money. In-app purchases range from £0.79 to £79.99. You can restrict in-app purchases by adjusting your User Controls in your Play Store settings.
Languages: English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Brazilian Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish, Turkish, Arabic and Thai.
An additional download of 50 to 150 MB is required to play this game. Please note the size of this required download may change without notice.
The game requires an Internet connection (3G or Wi-Fi) for downloads and updates, and other features including playing with friends, making in-app purchases and watching advertisements.

Please note that this game contains in-app purchases, including paid random items.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New adventures await!

The Crystalling
The Mane Six recount Flurry Heart's Crystalling in a new arena limited-time story!

Nightmare Night at the Museum -- Part 3
Sunset Shimmer takes over the museum gala. Will the exhibits come to life again?

Luna's Lost Pet
In part one of a new main questline, help Luna search for her lost pet possum.

12th Anniversary
Check out special versions of the Mane Six in a shop!

Celestial Club Membership
Join the club and enjoy special privileges!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi, everypony! Join us in celebrating the magic of the season with all these exciting events!

MAYORAL ELECTION
Ponyville has to organize its first elections in a while... Who will win? Find out in an all-new limited-time story!

HAPPY HEARTH'S WARMING
Twilight and Spike recount the heartwarming story of Rainbow the Flying Reindeer. Read along in an all-new limited-time story!

HEARTH'S WARMING EVE
Check out all-new ponies, décor, and other holiday items in a new Seasonal Shop!

descriptionShort: Official game to adventure with Twilight Sparkle, Rainbow Dash & more ponies

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi, everypony! Join us in celebrating the magic of the season with all these exciting events!

MAYORAL ELECTION
Ponyville has to organize its first elections in a while... Who will win? Find out in an all-new limited-time story!

HAPPY HEARTH'S WARMING
Twilight and Spike recount the heartwarming story of Rainbow the Flying Reindeer. Read along in an all-new limited-time story!

HEARTH'S WARMING EVE
Check out all-new ponies, décor, and other holiday items in a new Seasonal Shop!

Saddle up for fun, friendship and adventure with all of the most popular ponies in Equestria in the free official game based on the phenomenal MLP TV show.

Only Twilight Sparkle -- the student of Princess Celestia -- and her friends Rainbow Dash, Fluttershy and the rest can save the day for every horse in the city as they farm resources, meet cute friends and reach for their dreams.

• Over 300 characters: Meet a royal prince or princess one day, a cute adventure-seeking horse the next day and who knows what the next. Give them places to stay, nibble on hay and hear what they have to say.
Explore the Crystal Empire, Canterlot, Sweet Apple Acres farm and more.

• Make a pretty pony home: Beautify your MLP town and make it better than in any other city builders out there with cute houses, adorable decorations and enough magic for everypony that gallops by.

• Fantastic quests: Go on adventures based on your favourite stories from the TV show, and confront villains such as Tirek, King Sombra, Nightmare Moon, the Changelings and more.

• Mini-games: Play Ball Bounce with Twilight Sparkle, Magic Wings with Rainbow Dash, and get down with every horse in town in the Equestria Girls Dance games.

• Custom fashion: Give cute makeovers to turn any pony into a prince or princess pony with royal dresses and beautiful hairstyles featuring a rainbow of colours.

• Friendship is magic: Interact with friends and compete in hoof-pounding events.

• Real pony voices: Enjoy the official voice talent from the show.
Perfect for fans of city builders, free games or anyone who dreams of lounging on a pile of hay on the farm, surrounded by cute MLP horse friends such as Twilight Sparkle and Rainbow Dash, and becoming a royal prince or princess.

Saddle up for fun, friendship and adventure with all of the most popular ponies in Equestria in the free official game based on the phenomenal MLP TV show.

Only Twilight Sparkle -- the student of Princess Celestia -- and her friends Rainbow Dash, Fluttershy and the rest can save the day for every horse in the city as they farm resources, meet cute friends and reach for their dreams.

· Over 300 characters: Meet a royal prince or princess one day, a cute adventure-seeking horse the next day and who knows what the next. Give them places to stay, nibble on hay and hear what they have to say.
Explore the Crystal Empire, Canterlot, Sweet Apple Acres farm and more.

· Make a pretty pony home: Beautify your MLP town and make it better than in any other city builders out there with cute houses, adorable decorations and enough magic for everypony that gallops by.

· Fantastic quests: Go on adventures based on your favorite stories from the TV show, and confront villains such as Tirek, King Sombra, Nightmare Moon, the Changelings and more.

· Mini-games: Play Ball Bounce with Twilight Sparkle, Magic Wings with Rainbow Dash, and get down with every horse in town in the Equestria Girls Dance games.

· Custom fashion: Give cute makeovers to turn any pony into a prince or princess pony with royal dresses and beautiful hairstyles featuring a rainbow of colors.

· Friendship is magic: Interact with friends and compete in hoof-pounding events.

· Real pony voices: Enjoy the official voice talent from the show.
Perfect for fans of city builders, free games or anyone who dreams of lounging on a pile of hay on the farm, surrounded by cute MLP horse friends such as Twilight Sparkle and Rainbow Dash, and becoming a royal prince or princess.
_____
You can download and play this game for free. Please be informed that it also allows you to play using virtual currency, which can be acquired as you progress through the game, or by deciding to watch certain advertisements, or by paying with real money. Purchases of virtual currency using real money are performed using a credit card, or other form of payment associated with your account, and are activated when you input your Google Play account password, without the need to re-enter your credit card number or PIN.
In-app purchases can be restricted by adjusting the authentication settings within your Play Store settings (Google Play Store Home > Settings > Require authentication for purchases) and setting up a password for each purchase / Every 30 minutes or Never.
Disabling password protection may result in unauthorized purchases. We strongly encourage you to keep password protection turned on if you have children or if others could have access to your device.
This game contains advertising for Gameloft’s products or some third parties which will redirect you to a third-party site. You can disable your device’s ad identifier being used for interest-based advertising in the settings menu of your device. This option can be found in the Settings app > Accounts (Personal) > Google > Ads (Settings and Privacy) > Opt out of interest-based ads.
Certain aspects of this game will require the player to connect to the Internet.
_____

Please note that this game contains in-app purchases, including paid random items.

Terms of Use: http://www.gameloft.com/en/conditions-of-use
Privacy Policy: http://www.gameloft.com/en/privacy-notice
End-User License Agreement: http://www.gameloft.com/en/eula
descriptionShort: Official game to adventure with Twilight Sparkle, Rainbow Dash & more ponies

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi, everypony! Get ready for an all-new story featuring Rarity and elite ponies from Canterlot!

SWEET AND ELITE: A Trendsetter's Struggle!
Rarity takes a stroll down memory lane to share how hard it can be to fit in with Canterlot's most stylish citizens. Follow her heartfelt journey in this all-new limited-time event!

HARMONY STONES: A Moving Day!
Let it be known that, from now on, you can move the Harmony Stones on the map and place them wherever you like!

See you in Ponyville!

descriptionShort: Official game to adventure with Twilight Sparkle, Rainbow Dash & more ponies

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi, everypony! Get ready for an adventure-packed update!
• The Cutie THREE-Mark: Join Starlight Glimmer in an epic return to the Changelingverse and Sombraverse in a new limited-time event.
• Daunting Donkey-Day: The Mane Six turn into donkeys, Cranky and his friends become ponies—and it's up to you to uncover the mystery in this limited-time event!
• New Seasonal Shop: Festive ponies welcome spring with sunshiny treats!
• Resonant Harmony: Spend multiple Shards at once to get Harmony Stones.

title:
My Little Pony: Magic Princess
10.1.0k

creator: Gameloft SE
descriptionHtml:
Saddle up for fun, friendship and adventure with all of the most popular ponies in Equestria in the free official game based on the phenomenal MLP TV show.

Only Twilight Sparkle -- the student of Princess Celestia -- and her friends Rainbow Dash, Fluttershy and the rest can save the day for every horse in the city as they farm resources, meet cute friends and reach for their dreams.

• Over 300 characters: Meet a royal prince or princess one day, a cute adventure-seeking horse the next day and who knows what the next. Give them places to stay, nibble on hay and hear what they have to say.
Explore the Crystal Empire, Canterlot, Sweet Apple Acres farm and more.

• Make a pretty pony home: Beautify your MLP town and make it better than in any other city builders out there with cute houses, adorable decorations and enough magic for everypony that gallops by.

• Fantastic quests: Go on adventures based on your favourite stories from the TV show, and confront villains such as Tirek, King Sombra, Nightmare Moon, the Changelings and more.

• Mini-games: Play Ball Bounce with Twilight Sparkle, Magic Wings with Rainbow Dash, and get down with every horse in town in the Equestria Girls Dance games.

• Custom fashion: Give cute makeovers to turn any pony into a prince or princess pony with royal dresses and beautiful hairstyles featuring a rainbow of colours.

• Friendship is magic: Interact with friends and compete in hoof-pounding events.

• Real pony voices: Enjoy the official voice talent from the show.
Perfect for fans of city builders, free games or anyone who dreams of lounging on a pile of hay on the farm, surrounded by cute MLP horse friends such as Twilight Sparkle and Rainbow Dash, and becoming a royal prince or princess.
_____

You can download and play this game for free. Please be informed that it also allows you to play using virtual currency, which can be acquired as you progress through the game, or by paying with real money. In-app purchases range from £0.79 to £79.99. You can restrict in-app purchases by adjusting your User Controls in your Play Store settings.
Languages: English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Brazilian Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish, Turkish, Arabic and Thai.
An additional download of 50 to 150 MB is required to play this game. Please note the size of this required download may change without notice.
The game requires an Internet connection (3G or Wi-Fi) for downloads and updates, and other features including playing with friends, making in-app purchases and watching advertisements.
Certain aspects of this game, such as collaborating with, playing against or sharing in-game items with other players will require the player to connect to the Internet. Please note this connection is never compulsory to progress through the game. These features may be disabled in certain countries.
This app contains advertising for Gameloft products or products from some third parties which will redirect you to a third-party site. You can disable your device's ad identifier being used for interest-based advertising in the settings menu of your device. This option can be found in the Settings app > Accounts (Personal) > Google > Ads (Settings and Privacy) > Opt out of interest-based ads.
If you choose to allow us to do so, we may collect precise geolocation information in order for you to see players in your area and to bring you more relevant and geographically appropriate advertisements.

Please note that this game contains in-app purchases, including paid random items.
__

Privacy Policy: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/privacy-notice
Terms of Use: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/conditions-of-use
End-User License Agreement: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/eula

Hi, everypony! Exciting new adventures await!

Spike is invited to judge a singing contest on Mount Aris, but things take a worrying turn when the singing battle becomes a singing brawl. Discover what's behind the chaos in this all-new Limited-Time Story and bring harmony back to Equestria!

title:
My Little Pony: Magic Princess
10.2.0q

creator: Gameloft SE
descriptionHtml:
Saddle up for fun, friendship and adventure with all of the most popular ponies in Equestria in the free official game based on the phenomenal MLP TV show.

Only Twilight Sparkle -- the student of Princess Celestia -- and her friends Rainbow Dash, Fluttershy and the rest can save the day for every horse in the city as they farm resources, meet cute friends and reach for their dreams.

• Over 300 characters: Meet a royal prince or princess one day, a cute adventure-seeking horse the next day and who knows what the next. Give them places to stay, nibble on hay and hear what they have to say.
Explore the Crystal Empire, Canterlot, Sweet Apple Acres farm and more.

• Make a pretty pony home: Beautify your MLP town and make it better than in any other city builders out there with cute houses, adorable decorations and enough magic for everypony that gallops by.

• Fantastic quests: Go on adventures based on your favourite stories from the TV show, and confront villains such as Tirek, King Sombra, Nightmare Moon, the Changelings and more.

• Mini-games: Play Ball Bounce with Twilight Sparkle, Magic Wings with Rainbow Dash, and get down with every horse in town in the Equestria Girls Dance games.

• Custom fashion: Give cute makeovers to turn any pony into a prince or princess pony with royal dresses and beautiful hairstyles featuring a rainbow of colours.

• Friendship is magic: Interact with friends and compete in hoof-pounding events.

• Real pony voices: Enjoy the official voice talent from the show.
Perfect for fans of city builders, free games or anyone who dreams of lounging on a pile of hay on the farm, surrounded by cute MLP horse friends such as Twilight Sparkle and Rainbow Dash, and becoming a royal prince or princess.
_____

You can download and play this game for free. Please be informed that it also allows you to play using virtual currency, which can be acquired as you progress through the game, or by paying with real money. In-app purchases range from £0.79 to £79.99. You can restrict in-app purchases by adjusting your User Controls in your Play Store settings.
Languages: English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Brazilian Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish, Turkish, Arabic and Thai.
An additional download of 50 to 150 MB is required to play this game. Please note the size of this required download may change without notice.
The game requires an Internet connection (3G or Wi-Fi) for downloads and updates, and other features including playing with friends, making in-app purchases and watching advertisements.
Certain aspects of this game, such as collaborating with, playing against or sharing in-game items with other players will require the player to connect to the Internet. Please note this connection is never compulsory to progress through the game. These features may be disabled in certain countries.
This app contains advertising for Gameloft products or products from some third parties which will redirect you to a third-party site. You can disable your device's ad identifier being used for interest-based advertising in the settings menu of your device. This option can be found in the Settings app > Accounts (Personal) > Google > Ads (Settings and Privacy) > Opt out of interest-based ads.
If you choose to allow us to do so, we may collect precise geolocation information in order for you to see players in your area and to bring you more relevant and geographically appropriate advertisements.

Please note that this game contains in-app purchases, including paid random items.
__

Privacy Policy: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/privacy-notice
Terms of Use: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/conditions-of-use
End-User License Agreement: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/eula

In-app purchases can be restricted by adjusting the authentication settings within your Play Store settings (Google Play Store Home > Settings > Require authentication for purchases) and setting up a password for each purchase / Every 30 minutes or Never.
Disabling password protection may result in unauthorized purchases. We strongly encourage you to keep password protection turned on if you have children or if others could have access to your device.

This option can be found in the Settings app > Accounts (Personal) > Google > Ads (Settings and Privacy) > Opt out of interest-based ads.
Certain aspects of this game will require the player to connect to the Internet.
_____

Please note that this game contains in-app purchases, including paid random items.
